page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STEPHEN HAYTHORNTHWAITE - 8TH JUNE 1985 I WOKE UP AT 10.02 AM AND GOT DRESSED.I DIDN'T HAVE ANY BREAKFAST AS I WAS GOING TO HAVE AN EARLY DINNER.I HAD MY DINNER AT 11.15AM AND AT NOON I WENT OUT TO PLAY FOOTBALL IN A COMPETITION AT HOUGHTON.HOME AT 5.40PM AND HAD MY TEA AT 6.05PM AND THEN WATCHED TELEVISION UNTIL 7.20PM WHEN I WENT OUT TO PLAY ON MY BIKE UNTIL 8.00PM. I THEN WATCHED TELE-VISION AGAIN UNTIL 11.17PM WHEN I HAD MY SUPPER . ANOTHER QUICK SESSION WITH THE TELEVISION AND AT 11.50PM I DECIDED TO READ A BOOK FOR TEN MUNUTES (I READ 'TOPPER ANNUAL')AND FINALLY WENT TO BED AND SETTLED DOWN TO SLEEP ABOUT 12.20 AM. A FULL DAY AND LUCKILY I HAD NO SCHOOL THE MORNING AFTERWARDS!
